TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UIElement3DAutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer

summary.span: 將 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

span.span: Exposes types to UI Automation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，任何類別繼承自使用與通訊[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。By default, any class that inherits from uses to communicate with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]. 如果您建立繼承自一個類別，您可能想要提供自動化對等，以支援您的類別的功能。If you create a class that inherits from , you may want to provide an automation peer to support the functionality of your class. 覆寫方法以傳回字串，代表相關聯的項目類型。Override the method to return a string that represents the type of the element associated with the . 例如，如果您建立類別，稱為`My3DElement`與自動化對等呼叫`My3DElementAutomationPeer`，覆寫方法以傳回字串"My3DElement"。For example, if you create a class called `My3DElement` and an automation peer called `My3DElementAutomationPeer`, override the method to return the string "My3DElement". 如果您的類別符合其中一個已知的控制項類型，會覆寫方法傳回的。If your class matches one of the known control types, override the method to return that . 請注意，雖然現有值通常與相關聯 2D 控制項表示控制項的功能，不是它的外觀。Note that although the existing values are generally associated with 2D controls, the indicates a control's functionality, not its appearance. 因此，如果您叫用動作，當使用者按一下它，您可能想傳回。So if your invokes an action when the user clicks it, you probably want to return . 您的自訂行為決定您應該覆寫其他方法。The behavior of your custom determines what other methods you should override. 在每個方法主題描述如何使用方法，以及何時適合覆寫它。Each method topic in the describes how the method is used and when it is appropriate to override it. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法如果您不是內容項目。Override the method if your is not a content element. 內容項目包含呈現給使用者的資料。A content element contains data that is presented to the user. 舉例來說，內容項目是清單方塊或按鈕在對話方塊中的項目。An example of a content element is an item in a list box or a button on a dialog box. 您通常會使用非內容項目，也稱為周邊項目，來操作複合控制項中的內容。You typically use non-content elements, which are also called peripheral elements, to manipulate the content in a composite control. 非內容元素的範例是在下拉式清單控制項上的按鈕。An example of a non-content element is the button on a drop-down control. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不會指出項目是否可見。This property does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情況下，項目會顯示在螢幕上，但仍看不到。In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible. 比方說，如果項目但遮蔽其他項目在螢幕上時，它可能無法顯示。For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible. 方法會傳回在此情況下`false`。In this case the method returns `false`. 類別繼承自通常不需要覆寫。Classes that inherit from typically do not need to override . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
